Title: Buried in Stone
Description: We need to go into the cave, the one mentioned near the last slate. It's not signed, but I think that's the foreman's handwriting... and we've looked everywhere else. We have to investigate.
ObjectivesText: Investigate the cave at the back of the Taelloch Mine
CompletionText: We're missing something... There must be something in that cave!
RewardText: I knew it! I was right! There's something in here. Something someone was trying to hide.
